name: llm-commentary
description: A non-chat way to get LLM to respond in the sidebar to whatever you're writing.

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.release: gh release create $(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --title "$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" manifest.json main.js styles.css && git push
